author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iraq reports second coronavirus death in Baghdad
description: Iraq reported late on Wednesday its second coronavirus death in the capital Baghdad, the health ministry said in a statement published by the state news agency.
content:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Iraq reported late on Wednesday its second coronavirus death in the capital Baghdad, the health ministry said in a statement published by the state news agency. 
The health ministry added the patient had many chronic diseases. 
Reporting b… [+44 chars]

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iraq announces first coronavirus death in capital
description: Iraq announced on Wednesday its first coronavirus death in the capital Baghdad, the health ministry said.
content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Iraq announced on Wednesday its first coronavirus death in the capital Baghdad, the health ministry said. 
Reporting by Ahmed Aboulenein; Writing by Ulf Laessing; Editing by Chris Reese

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iraq reports six new coronavirus cases: health ministry
description: Iraq reported six new coronavirus cases on Sunday, bringing the total number of cases there to 19, the health ministry said.
content:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Iraq reported six new coronavirus cases on Sunday, bringing the total number of cases there to 19, the health ministry said. 
Two of the six are in Baghdad, and the other four in Sulaimaniya, and all had recently returned from Iran, it adde… [+36 chars]

title: Iraq puts Germany and Qatar on coronavirus entry ban list
description: Iraq has banned entry to travelers coming from Germany and Qatar, its health minister said on Friday, bringing the total number of countries on its entry ban list to 13 as it tries to stem the spread of coronavirus.
content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Iraq has banned entry to travelers coming from Germany and Qatar, its health minister said on Friday, bringing the total number of countries on its entry ban list to 13 as it tries to stem the spread of coronavirus.

title: Iraq announces two new coronavirus cases - Health Ministry
description: Iraq has detected two new coronavirus patients, both of whom had recently visited Iran, the Health Ministry said on Monday, bringing the total cases recorded so far to 21.
content:

title: Iran to temporarily free 54,000 prisoners as coronavirus spreads
description: Iran will temporarily release 54,000 people from prisons as officials struggle to contain the rapid spread of the biggest coronavirus outbreak in the Middle East.
content:

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Iraqi government imposes curfew in Baghdad over coronavirus concerns
description: The Iraqi government has imposed a curfew in the capital Baghdad as of March 17 until March 24 to prevent coronavirus from spreading, the state news agency said on Sunday.
content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - The Iraqi government has imposed a curfew in the capital Baghdad as of March 17 until March 24 to prevent coronavirus from spreading, the state news agency said on Sunday.
